Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 3 Vedanāttika » 3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Vedanāttika
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
81.
2006Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2007Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2008Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
82.
2009Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2010Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2011Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
83.
2012Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2013Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2014Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
